attributes.review: Absolute trash app. I downloaded this app hoping to further support our lord and savior president trump, but it took at least 2 days for the app to download. Then, once the app was downloaded I couldn’t access any of my other apps. I would rate this app a negative star if I could.
attributes.title: Bigly bad app

attributes.review:
I was confused when the app took exactly 4 days and 20 hours🌿✨to download but it all makes sense now. When I finally got the app to open my entire phone began to glitch🦠out and then a message popped up on my phone in Chinese and then read to me in English which said “all your bank information and phone information will be sent to the Chinese government if you press continue”😖 the only button to press was a continue button😱and my phone wasn’t even able to shut off or click out of the app! I was so frustrated🤬that I gave the Chinese all my information. Now Im in debt and all my private information on my phone is on the internet 😞🤟. Anyways don’t download this app it’s very bad😣.  Take this app off the App Store and arrest Donald Trump for the countless rapes he has committed ❤️. 

Xoxo- Genz💕✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: Honestly this is the worst app that ever came to the App Store. I am a huge Trump supporter and I thought that downloading the app would be fun. I was very wrong. Upon downloading the app and actually going into it, I discovered that the app was only full of that picture of Donald Trump getting spray tanned.-5 out of 10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: Do. Not. Download.
